data.meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.
data.sentence: The word الْحُسْنَى comes from the root ح س ن and is associated with the meanings: To be handsome, make good, seem good or beautiful, be excellent.

data.meanings: to be in advance, go/pass before, surpass, get the better of, get in advance, precede, overtake, come first to the goal, outstrip, overcome, go forth previously, escape, go speedily, go first, race/strive/excel, prevent, the act of advancing. One who precedes or outstrips in race, foremost.masbuq - one who is surpassed or beaten or is out run in a race.
data.sentence: The word سَبَقَتْ comes from the root س ب ق and is associated with the meanings: to be in advance, go/pass before, surpass, get the better of, get in advance, precede, overtake, come first to the goal, outstrip, overcome, go forth previously, escape, go speedily, go first, race/strive/excel, prevent, the act of advancing. One who precedes or outstrips in race, foremost.masbuq - one who is surpassed or beaten or is out run in a race.

data.meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.
data.sentence: The word مُبْعَدُونَ comes from the root ب ع د and is associated with the meanings: Becoming distant, remote, far off, aloof or far awayRemoved, retired, withdrew to a distanceAlienated, estranged, wide separation, great distancePossessing judgment and prudence, penetrating, effective judgment, depth or far reaching judgmentGo or going a great length or far in hostility.
